modules.description: The module provides functions for creating and modifying structured schedule option records, focusing on accessing and updating fields like ID, title, time, and visual attributes through getter/setter patterns, while handling string and boolean properties such as icons, LED settings, and recurrence intervals. It enables precise customization of notification configurations, including visual elements and timing parameters, for applications requiring dynamic schedule management.

Provides methods to schedule, cancel, and retrieve local notifications with custom titles, messages, and timestamps. Operates on notification objects containing identifiers, fire dates, and alert content. Used to trigger reminders, alerts, and timed messages within a mobile application.

manages structured schedule options with precise control over fields like ID, title, time, and visual properties, using getter and setter functions to modify string and boolean attributes such as icons, LED settings, and recurrence intervals. It supports dynamic configuration of notifications by allowing updates to timing and appearance parameters. Operations include setting a notification's title, adjusting its recurrence interval, and modifying visual elements like icons. Examples include scheduling a recurring alert with a custom icon or updating a notification's time and LED color dynamically.
